Product.Name: Tall toothpick jean in garment-dyed twill
Product.Description:
Our designers took a bright idea and ran with it. The talk-of-the-town toothpick gets a jolt of color in a rainbow range of twill colors, each carefully garment-dyed for a pitch-perfect hue. Cotton with a hint of stretch. Belt loops. Zip fly. Traditional 5-pocket styling. Import. Machine wash. The nature of this product may result in color transfer we suggest laundering at home in your machine before wear.
  • Sits lower on hips, with a superskinny, straight leg
  • 30" inseam.

Product.Name: Tall ankle stretch toothpick jean in classic rinse
Product.Description:
Our ankle-length toothpick silhouette, in an exciting new Italian denim made with bi-stretch, a fiber component that creates stretch in both length and width for rubber band-like slimming effects and stretch recovery even after many wears. To highlight its intense blue color, we gave it a gentle wash and finished it with classic stitching. Italian cotton/poly with a hint of stretch. Belt loops. Zip fly. Traditional 5-pocket styling. Import. Machine wash. The nature of this product may result in color transfer we suggest laundering at home in your machine before wear.
  • Sits lower on hips, with a superskinny, straight leg.
  • 31" inseam.

Product.Name: High-waisted skinny jean in white
Product.Description:
Our have-to-have high rise freshened up in cool, so-right-now white. Based on a vintage '70s silhouette, this insanely flattering fit sits just a smidgen below the natural waist, with a skinny leg. Cotton with a hint of stretch. Belt loops. Zip fly. Traditional 5-pocket styling. Import. Machine wash.
  • Original fit—our very first fit with the highest rise.
  • Sits at natural waist.
  • Fitted through hip and thigh, with a superskinny, straight leg.
  • 32" inseam.

Product.Name: Joni jean
Product.Description:
We're completely hung up on these high-waisted flares in the most buttery soft, drapey white denim. Crafted from a special Turkish bi-stretch cotton, they're quite possibly the most polished, perfect-fitting jeans we've ever made. Cotton with a hint of stretch. Belt loops. Zip fly. Front and back patch pockets. Import. Machine wash.
  • Original fit—our very first fit with the highest rise.
  • Sits at natural waist.
  • Fitted through hip and thigh, with a wide leg.
  • 34" inseam.

Product.Name: Classic flare jean in pitch black wash
Product.Description:
This season, flares are making a major comeback. With its higher rise, crisp trouser press and wide-cut leg, our newest denim fit is the best way to get your flare fix. Product.Name: Vintage straight jean in old faithful wash
Product.Description:
Based on a pair of vintage blues, our newest denim fit is definitely bound for glory. We put a traditional 12-ounce denim through the wringer for weeks to achieve high-low color and had-it-forever softness. Finished off with western-inspired curved pockets and a straight-off-the-ranch easy fit, these jeans have the makings of a genuine denim legend. Cotton with a hint of stretch. Belt loops. Zip fly. Traditional 5-pocket styling. Import. Machine wash. The nature of this product may result in color transfer we suggest laundering at home in your machine before wear.

Product.Name: Slim boy jean in beach comb wash
Product.Description:
Introducing our brand-new boy jean: with a relaxed, borrowed-from-the-guys feel and cut-just-for-you proportions that fit like a dream. Designed to sit lower on the hips with a subtle slouch and with a slim but not skinny leg that looks laid-back, they're already our new favorite blues. Cotton. Belt loops. Zip fly. Traditional 5-pocket styling. Import. Machine wash. The nature of this product may result in color transfer we suggest laundering at home in your machine before wear.
  • Sits on hips.

Product.Name: Gaucho jean
Product.Description:
Let loose this spring in our fearlessly flared and cropped gaucho pant. A refreshing break from the parade of pin-thin pants, it's the best excuse we have to give our skinny jeans the day off. Pair it with some tall boots, a silk blouse and voilà a perfect pant pick-me-up with just the right dose of boho-chic attitude. Cotton with a hint of stretch. Belt loops. Zip fly. Slant pockets. Import. Machine wash.
  • Favorite fit—our most universal fit with a medium rise.
  • Sits below waist.
  • Fitted through hip and thigh, with a flared leg.
  • 24" inseam.
